duties_responsibilities.duty: Take ownership of managing successful client deliverables and activations, ensuring exceptional execution and exceeding client expectations.
Maintain high levels of sports and entertainment ticketed asset utilization, maximizing value for clients and fostering long-lasting relationships.
Plan and organize engaging customer events that provide sales representatives with opportunities to network with prospects and clients, fostering meaningful connections.
Work collaboratively with various departments to plan and align marketing deliverables, ensuring seamless integration of efforts across the organization.
Execute partnership assets with esteemed sports properties such as NFL, NBA, MLB, and other sports entities, enhancing brand visibility and engagement.
Handle miscellaneous tasks and projects as needed, contributing to the overall success and growth of the team and organization.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Business, Marketing, Sports Management, or related field (or equivalent experience)
